item.description:
Dear investors,

Last week's Meetup was a very dynamic one, and a couple of people stayed till past 11 to keep discussing the deal we reviewed!

I understand that some people will have trouble Meeting on Friday evenings, so I'm planning the next one for Tuesday September 13th.  Please RSVP, and I look forward to meeting others who have not yet attended.

PLEASE BRING PLENTY OF BUSINESS CARDS, INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITIES, AND ACTUAL DEALS YOU'RE WORKING ON (OR YOUR HUNGER FOR THEM), AND LET'S DO SOME BUSINESS!  

$10 will include pizza, drinks and dessert.

LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU THEN.

VAHE OHANNESSIAN
item.how_to_find_us: Off Mt. Auburn Street in Watertown.

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Investment Deals - buy, sell, wholesale, etc.
